## Task 3: Export Formats

All charts were exported in the following formats:

- **PDF**: Vector format, scalable, best for printing and publications
- **JPG**: Raster format, compressed, smaller file size, lossy compression
- **SVG**: Vector format, scalable, editable, best for web and graphics software
- **TIFF**: Raster format, lossless compression, high quality, larger file size
- **BMP**: Raster format, uncompressed, very large file size, highest quality

### File Format Comparison

Vector formats (PDF, SVG) maintain quality at any scale and have smaller file sizes for simple graphics. Raster formats (JPG, TIFF, BMP) are resolution-dependent with JPG offering the best compression but lossy quality, TIFF providing lossless compression, and BMP offering uncompressed maximum quality at the cost of very large file sizes.
